title: Presumed Innocent (1990) Harrison Ford (DVDrip,Opt.MULTISUBS)
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0100404/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0100404/</a>

Directed by Alan J. Pakula
With Bonnie Bedelia and Brian Dennehy

Optional subtitles in separate idx/sub files:
Croatian (Hrvatski), Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hebrew, Hungarian, Icelandic, Italian, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Spanish, Swedish, Turkish.

Harrison Ford is excellent in this captivating courtroom drama, where he must investigate the murder of his female colleage and lover -- and finds himself framed with evidence planted in the most unexpected places.

My new ripping procedure now produces decent quality for such a long film compressed into just 700 MiB. 

Widescreen DVDrip XviD 2-pass 720x368, good stereo sound AC3.
Burn tested, runs well in both my standalone DivX players.
